Description: Fragment of a green faience amulet of the god Osiris (or Khnum?), feet broken off. A cylindrical perforation runs horizontally through the figure’s head. Reverse is smooth and flat. Glazing in poor condition, especially in front.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.8, below level 1
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 137)
